name: skill-to-kiro (MartinRistov)
description: [项目级] Convert any Claude Skill’s SKILL.md into Amazon Kiro steering files (.kiro/steering/)。来源: https://github.com/MartinRistov/skill-to-kiro

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: This Claude Skill transforms any Claude Skill's `SKILL.md` into a complete set of Amazon Kiro steering files (`.kiro/steering/`). It intelligently extracts goals, stack, structure, guardrails, and procedures, mapping them to Kiro's format with appropriate inclusion modes (`always`, `fileMatch`, `manual`).

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
✅ **Intelligent Mapping** - Automatically categorizes content into appropriate Kiro files  
✅ **Inclusion Modes** - Sets `always`, `fileMatch`, and `manual` based on content type  
✅ **Security First** - Redacts secrets and never includes credentials  
✅ **Safe Operation** - Shows diffs and asks before overwriting existing files  
✅ **Complete Coverage** - Generates all core Kiro steering files  
✅ **Language Support** - Creates language-specific files for Python and TypeScript
